title: mcheil坦克问题
author: l8951060
txt_content:
求教！！！！！
MCHEIl里面的坦克可以破坏木制品求解决！！！

replies.txt_content:
config/mcheli.cfg
编辑
找到
Collision_DestroyBlock = true
改为
Collision_DestroyBlock = false
